You need to fly around the screen and destroy all of the creatures by hitting them with your lance (careful, if they hit you instead you'll lose a life). After all of the creatures are gone, you enter the second screen which is inside the castle. Here there is a large pit of lava and a flying dragon. To destroy the dragon you need to hit it's stomach with your lance. If you are hit by one of the dragon's fireballs you'll be temporarily stunned and unable to fly. If you end up falling into the lava, you'll lose a life. If you can defeat the dragon, the game repeats at a higher difficulty level. The game ends when you lose all of your lives.

game.name: Skiing
game.desc: The object of the SKIING'. game is to successfully negotiate the course in the feast amount of time

game.name: Slither
game.desc: Slither es similar en naturaleza al exitoso juego de arcade Centipede de Atari. Controlas a tu serpiente mientras se desliza por la pantalla. Donde este juego difiere mucho de Centipede es que puedes disparar en cuatro direcciones diferentes al mismo tiempo para eliminar a los malos que intentan cazarte. Las malas serpientes que te persiguen aparecerán desde varios ángulos en la pantalla, a menudo varias al mismo tiempo. El juego se incluyó con el Roller Controller de Coleco y no se puede jugar sin él.

game.name: Slurpy
game.desc: En este juego controlas a una extraña criatura verde con una larga trompa en la parte delantera, moviéndola en una cueva abierta sin desplazamiento de pantalla. En cada nivel, tu objetivo es comer diez semillas flotantes. Mientras tanto, el juego hace lo posible por evitar que lo logres, lanzando una multitud de diferentes monstruos contra ti. Afortunadamente, casi todos los monstruos del juego también pueden ser comidos. Si un enemigo toca a Slurpy, perderás una de tus preciadas vidas; ¡pero desgraciado el enemigo que se cruza en el camino de la trompa de Slurpy y es atrapado por su increíble poder de succión!

game.name: Smurf - Paint 'n' Play Workshop
game.desc:
Elija cualquiera de las cuatro escenas de fondo y comience a agregar objetos de clip art, muebles y diseño de forma libre. Las cuatro escenas son: -Fuera de una casa de setas -Dentro de una casa de setas -El cruce del río -Castillo de Gargamel
Crea cualquier número de escenarios decorados y luego usa cualquiera de los controles para convertirte en uno de los cuatro personajes: Pitufo, Papá Pitufo, Pitufina o Gargamel y juega con el gráfico que has creado. Los personajes pueden moverse hacia la izquierda, derecha, arriba, abajo ... saltar y soltarse.
No existe un método para guardar su trabajo, por lo que todo desaparece cuando se corta la energía.

game.name: Smurf Rescue in Gargamel's Castle
game.desc: Pitufina ha sido secuestrada y encarcelada en el castillo de Gargamel. El jugador controla a un pitufo que debe saltar obstáculos y huir de los enemigos para finalmente llegar hasta Pitufina e intentar rescatarla. Una vez completado el juego este se reinicia con obstáculos que se mueven más rápido y el camino hasta el castillo de Gargamel es mas largo incrementando la dificultad.

game.name: Space Fury
game.desc: ¡Entonces! ¡Una criatura para mi diversión! ¡Prepárate para la batalla! "Estas son las palabras pronunciadas por el comandante alienígena al iniciar un juego de Space Fury. El juego es similar a Asteroids en el sentido de que tienes una pantalla de espacio que se envuelve sobre sí misma y tu nave solo puede empujar y disparar. Sin embargo, mientras que en Asteroids te enfrentaste a pedazos de roca que no podían perseguirte, Space Fury proporciona naves alienígenas que te perseguirán.

game.name: Space Invasion
game.desc: Space Invasion se basó en el mejor juego de disparos de todos los tiempos, y es un excelente puerto de Coleco, que incluye tanto la versión original como la de lujo. Dondzila señala que los secretos están incluidos.

game.name: Space Panic
game.desc: A game remarkably similar to Lode Runner, you play an astronaut with limited oxygen (time) chased around by various space aliens. Your only method of dealing with these multicolored threats from space is to dig a hole, lure it into a hole and then manually fill up the hole with the alien in it. Dropping aliens on top of other aliens earns you extra points and eliminates both. Levels get progressively harder and enemies grow faster.

game.name: Spectron
game.desc: The planetary clust Shalix is plagued by an intergalactic dust cloud that blocked out their sun. Now the Shalix have built a fleet to colonize new worlds. Unfortunately they set their eyes on Spectron, the player's home world. It's up to the player to repel the invading forces from Shalix.

game.name: Spy Hunter
game.desc: En Spy Hunter, la acción se desarrolla desde arriba. Tu coche está equipado con ametralladoras que te ayudarán a eliminar a los numerosos enemigos de la carretera, pero ten cuidado de no disparar a civiles. De vez en cuando, te cruzarás con un furgón de armas y, si te topas con él, tu coche estará equipado con una segunda arma. En varios puntos, la carretera se divide y puedes entrar en un hangar para convertir temporalmente tu coche en un barco. Los coches intentarán sacarte de la carretera, los enemigos te dispararán desde la parte trasera de una limusina y los helicópteros te lanzarán bombas.

game.name: Squish'em Featuring Sam
game.desc: Climb up the side of a series of 48-story buildings to collect suitcases full of money, while avoiding creepy monsters and falling objects that try to knock you off. Fortunately, you can strike back against the monsters by smashing them flat, by smashing them on the head. Don't linger too long, though, since they are soon resurrected, white and unsquishable.

game.name: Star Trek : Strategic Operations Simulator
game.desc: Star Trek: Strategic Operations Simulator es un juego de acción arcade en el que tomas el control de Starship Enterprise. ¡Tu misión es salvar a la Federación de NOMAD! Antes de que tengas la oportunidad de destruir NOMAD, tendrás que abrirte camino a través de diez niveles (cada uno con varias rondas). En cada ronda puede encontrar combatientes Klingon, platillos de antimateria mortales, campos de asteroides y meteoritos mortales, todos los cuales son capaces de agotar la energía de las Empresas.

game.name: Star Wars : The Arcade Game
game.desc: Conversión del shoot 'em up en primera persona de Atari Games basado en la película original de Star Wars. Asumes el papel de Luke Skywalker, con el objetivo de destruir la Estrella de la Muerte, lo que, como cualquier fan sabe, implica atacar el punto débil cerca del escape. Para llegar deberás pasar entre multitud de enjambres de TIE Fighters que te atacarán sin parar. Completa el juego y volverá a repetirse con una dificultad cada vez mayor, aumentando el reto que te ofrece Star Wars. El juego utiliza gráficos vectoriales, que permiten mucha acción a alta velocidad.

game.name: Steamroller
game.desc:
Repair the potholes in the road. If a beach ball gets in the way, pop it! But beware of beach bombs!
You are driving around a continuously deteriorating road, where potholes are forming. You must drive over these potholes to repair them. Along the way, you can drive over beach balls to pop them for points. Don't let a pothole go too long because if it does, it will become a manhole. If a beach ball falls into a manhole, it will emerge as a beach bomb, that can damage you. In a two player game, knock your opponent into the bombs. In a one player game, avoid the other steamroller as it will kill you except for the last few seconds of the round. In that short time, hitting it will kill it.

game.name: Strike It!
game.desc:
Strike! Strike! Strike!
Our "Strike It" is the most interesting TV game between various varieties and high techniques uses the simplest regulation. It is not so easy to hold your pin pon racket to hit the ball and reflecting to the bricks to get high points. So speedy reflection and judgment are necessary. Then you most pay your full attention to the direction and angle of reflection of the ball. Sharp eyesight, speddy hand control and smart judgment are principals to win the game, Try it now!.

game.name: Subroc
game.desc: SubRoc 3-D is a shooter, where you look through a periscope and shoot at both sea and air-targets.

game.name: Super Action Baseball
game.desc:
El único juego de béisbol de Colecovision y el primero de la serie Super Action, Super Action Baseball fue especialmente diseñado para funcionar con los controladores Super Action.
El bateo se realiza con una vista en ángulo en la que se ve al bateador en la parte inferior izquierda de la pantalla y el lanzador en el centro-derecha. La parte superior de la pantalla está reservada para vigilar las bases. Cuando se acerca la pelota, el jugador intenta golpear la pelota con su bate para lanzarla por el aire. Un buen golpe permitirá a tu jugador el correr a las bases. Correr se hace con la "rueda" en la parte superior de los Super Action Controllers. También es posible robar bases sin estar la pelota en juego.
La recepción es sencilla, con los controladores Super Action hay 4 botones distintos que corresponden a cada base. Por lo tanto, la pelota se puede lanzar a cualquiera de las bases en cualquier momento.

game.name: Super Action Football
game.desc: Otro juego de la serie Super Action que utiliza los Super Action Controllers de Coleco. Juega contra la computadora o enfréntate cara a cara con un amigo durante 4 cuartos de acción de fútbol americano. Da un paso atrás y lanza una bomba larga a tu receptor en la zona de anotación, patea la pelota o completa un tackle mientras controlas a uno de los 3 jugadores ofensivos o defensivos. ¿Qué baile harás cuando pases la línea de gol en los últimos segundos del partido?

game.name: Super Action Soccer
game.desc: Super Action Soccer gives you the chance to be the most accomplished star player of any team that ever was. You will be the goal-keeper diving to make incredible saves, the full back with fierce last minute tackles, the mid-field "general" directing shrewd passes and the centre forward scoring great goals. You will be involved all the time in the most exciting moments of the game. You will score the winning goal!

game.name: Super Cobra
game.desc: Super Cobra es un juego de disparos de desplazamiento lateral basado en el juego de arcade. Eres un piloto de helicópteros en una misión de vigilancia en territorio enemigo; tu objetivo es atravesar con vida las diversas pistas de obstáculos y obtener la mayor cantidad de puntos posible. Edificios altos, montañas, túneles estrechos y varios enemigos (como tanques, cohetes, minas y más) pueden interponerse en el camino y destruir tu helicóptero si no tienes cuidado. Para ayudarte a defenderte, el helicóptero está armado con una ametralladora y bombas que pueden usarse para destruir los tanques y cohetes enemigos. Para hacer la tarea más difícil, su helicóptero tiene una cantidad limitada de combustible. A lo largo de los paisajes hay tanques de combustible; si uno de estos es disparado o bombardeado, se le otorgará combustible adicional. A medida que avanzan los niveles, los enemigos se vuelven más agresivos, el combustible se vuelve más escaso y el paisaje se vuelve más difícil de navegar.

game.name: Super Cross Force
game.desc: There's a new menace in the galaxy! It's the evil Morplus from the planet Tzoris. Morplus are without question the fiercest warriors east of the Libra Super-Galactic Cluster. They arrive in teams of two to four members, and in waves with the more dangerous squadrons arriving later. In the more advanced skill levels, they're impossible to stop! Both their flight patterns and bombing maneuvers are highly unpredictable. What can you do against odds like these? There's only one hope: you must catch them in a devastating super cross force. The key is your awesome "Spectron" weapon, which creates a dual holographic laser blast. You can get them coming and going, and if you run low on energy, you can deftly swing your joystick to the left or right to catch the energy packs dropped by your mother ship.

game.name: Super DK! Junior
game.desc: Juego prototipo. Super dk! junior es la secuela del juego super arcade dk! El jugador controla al hijo de Donkey Kong, Donkey Kong Junior, quien entregará a su padre, capturado por Mario.

game.name: Super DK!
game.desc: Super Donkey Kong for ColecoVision is a hacked version of the enhanced game made for Coleco's Adam computer. The main difference you will notice is the addition of the intermission sequences. While these were present in the arcade version of the game, Coleco elected to omit them in the cartridge version. They make for a more arcade-like experience but add nothing to the game.

game.name: Tank Wars
game.desc: Protect the Radar Base and yourself from being hit by various enemy tanks, and further trace to defeat every enemy you confront. In this game, you fight by five of your own tanks against 20 enemy tanks in each scene.

game.name: Tapper
game.desc:
Tapper is an action game where you're a beer tapper (barman) and have to serve beer to demanding customers. There are four customers, each has its own lane lengthier than the previous one, whom you have to keep at bay. If they reach the end of the lane without receiving their beer, you're a goner; if you miss one and accidentally spill beer needlessly you lose a life and should one of them throw you back the mug and you fail to catch it, you lose a life as well.
Occasionally a bizarre icon will appear on one of the lines and, should you grab it, will invoke a "cabarette"-style show which will keep some of the customers occupied.
The Xbox 360 version includes bonus rounds, as well as co-op and versus multiplayer modes, also online, along with achievements.

game.name: Telly Turtle
game.desc: Telly Turtle is basically a port of the LOGO programming language with the main character being a turtle. The keypad buttons of the Colecovision are used to issue commands from a selection presented on-screen and eventually, programs can be formed to move Telly Turtle around the screen in a series of directions. Music and Sound Effects are also added into the mix to broaden the programming experience

game.name: The Activision Decathlon
game.desc:
Activision Decathlon es una serie de juegos olímpicos similar a la serie de juegos Epyx. Hasta cuatro jugadores pueden competir en los diez eventos diferentes de un decatlón de la vida real, ya sea en secuencia o individualmente. Se incluyen los 100 metros lisos, el salto de longitud, el lanzamiento de peso, el salto de altura, la carrera de 400 metros, los 110 metros con vallas, el lanzamiento de disco, el salto con pértiga, el lanzamiento de jabalina y la carrera de 1500 metros.
Los eventos de carrera plana implican un simple movimiento del joystick, que debe equilibrarse con pulsaciones de botones en el momento preciso para superar los obstáculos: golpearlos o romper el paso provoca una pérdida de impulso y, por lo tanto, de tiempo. Para los eventos de saltos y lanzamientos, debe generar impulso moviendo y luego presionar el botón para lanzar o saltar en el momento que considere apropiado.

game.name: The Dam Busters
game.desc:
Dam Busters is an early flight simulation, set in World War II. It focuses on Dam Busters who historically were used to heavily bombard strategic objectives, in this case dams.
This task is not easy, as en route you will face heavy opposition forces. Fortunately, you won't be a sitting bomber in the air. Your aircraft is equipped with machine guns (left and right) with unlimited rounds of fire power, so fire at will as the enemy approaches.
When the time comes, you will have to bomb the target manually. So, get ready to unload the cargo and give them hell!

game.name: The Dukes of Hazzard
game.desc:
Driving around in the car known as the "General Lee", you must avoid all sorts of obstacles in an attempt to catch up to Jeremiah Stinge. Beware though as Boss Hog and his police force are trying to chase you. The Duke boys are as usual on the side of right in this scenario and it's Jeremiah who has orchestrated things to put them on the wrong side of the law.
The gameplay is a top-down view of your vehicle heading down a path vertically across the screen. Also on the screen is your speedometer, a bonus timer (faster times mean more points!) and a gear shift. The General Lee itself has gears 1 through 4 and higher gears mean MORE SPEED. As for obstacles, the path ahead of you is full of hills and oil slicks making it difficult to catch up to (and pass) your prey.
Successful completion of levels results in faster chases and more obstacles on the road. Also an increased "Boss Hogg" presence.

game.name: The Heist
game.desc: As a cat burglar, it's up to you to collect all of the valuable paintings from each level while avoiding security systems, pits and robotic sentries which move back and forth. Each level is comprised of three floors and ladders connecting them. Your cat burglar has only the ability to jump, and you must rely entirely on that to keep you alive.

game.name: The Yolks on You
game.desc: This game was only a prototype.Get the eggs/chicks into the coop while fighting off hawks, foxes, and snakes. Avoid groundhog holes and don't break any eggs

game.name: Threshold
game.desc: Threshold is a simple Shoot'em up game. You are in control of a spaceship at the bottom of the screen and have to shoot several formations of enemies on the top of the screen. To make things more difficult you have limited time in form of a fuel tank which will get refilled after you cleared a number of waves. Besides that your spacecraft is equipped with a laser that tends to overheat. Every shot make the heat bar of the laser increase a bit. Once it reached its maximum you can't fire anymore and are forced to wait until it cooled down while slowly running out of fuel.

game.name: Time Pilot
game.desc: Time Pilot es un juego de disparos de estilo arcade. Piloteando tu nave espacial confiable, debes destruir los escuadrones de naves enemigas que te están atacando. En cada nivel, tienes una cuota de enemigos que deben ser destruidos. Después de cumplir tu cuota, aparecerá un jefe final del nivel; al ser destruido, avanzarás al siguiente nivel. El juego comienza en el año 1910, y cada vez que se completa un nivel, avanzas en el tiempo. En 1910, solo tienes que enfrentar a biplanos relativamente desarmados, pero a medida que avanzan los niveles, también lo hace la tecnología. Cada nuevo nivel trae consigo naves más duras y con armas más pesadas, incluyendo jets, helicópteros e incluso platillos voladores. De vez en cuando, encontrarás un paracaídas; si lo alcanzas, ganarás puntos extra.

game.name: TOMARC The Barbarian
game.desc: In Tomarc the Barbarian Senta is being held captive in a magical cage, and Tomarc needs to rescue her! In this action game you will control both Tomarc and Senta simultaneously. Tomarc is lost in a series of caves somewhere searching for his magic sword, and then must locate Senta to set her free. Deadly rats and other dangers must be avoided as you run and jump around the caves. Meanwhile, Senta must defend herself from giant bats and other creatures while trapped in the cage; although she can't move, she is capable of firing magic at enemies to destroy them. You are able to switch screens between the two characters to select which character to control. Listening to the sound effects can help you determine when the other character is in trouble and you should switch screens.

game.name: Tournament Tennis
game.desc:
Most of the conventions that became standard for tennis simulations appear in this early title - indeed many were pioneered by it. Matches can be played at quarter-final, semi-final or final level - winning at one level automatically moves you onto the next one. They can last for 3 or 5 sets, with a player requiring a 2-game lead to win a set, although a tie-break comes in at 6-6 in all but the final set.
The view is pseudo-3D, from above the court, and features a shadow on the ball to give a more realistic appearance and make it easier to judge its height. Spectators turn their heads to view the action, and ball-boys run on to the court to retrieve a dead ball. Shot speed, direction and spin can all be applied, and forehand and backhand strokes are both available.

game.name: Turbo
game.desc: It's you and several other cars racing through a variety of landscapes in Turbo. From the starting line onward, you need to maneuver around and pass various cars in your way while racing towards the finish line. Some of the landscapes you'll travel through include city streets, long roads in the country, seaside highways and dark tunnels.

game.name: Tutankham
game.desc: Tutankham is an arcade action game played from a top down point of view. You are an explorer in King Tut's tomb on a mission to retrieve as many of the valuable treasures as you can find. In addition to the treasures, you will also find a key in each of the chambers. This is needed in order to unlock the entrance to the next, more difficult chamber. Be careful, for the tomb is guarded by many dangerous creatures! Cobras, bats, scorpions, and more all appear in the maze and will cause you to lose a life if you're caught! To defend yourself you are armed with a laser gun which you can fire left or right, but not up or down. In each of the mazes you are also give one "flash" which can be used to destroy all creatures currently on the screen.

game.name: Up'n Down
game.desc:
Este es un port para casa de un juego de arcade de Sega de 1983 que fue distribuido por Bally Midway.
El objetivo es conducir alrededor de un curso sinuoso y recolectar todas las banderas de colores. Puedes saltar sobre huecos y sobre otros autos o incluso caer sobre ellos. Si aterrizas sobre otro auto, lo matas y obtienes puntos. También puedes recolectar cosas como globos y conos de helado para obtener puntos adicionales. Cuanto más rápido recolectes todas las banderas, más grande será el bono de tiempo que obtendrás.
En niveles posteriores, hay callejones sin salida o huecos y un vehículo que lleva una bandera que necesitas, por lo que tendrás que saltar sobre él. Si eres golpeado por otro vehículo o sales del curso, pierdes una vida. En juegos para dos jugadores, se alternan los turnos.

game.name: Venture
game.desc: Venture es una conversión del popular juego de arcade. El objetivo del aventurero Winky es recolectar tantos tesoros como pueda. El problema es que se encuentran dispersos en numerosas mazmorras, y en cada una de ellas hay varias cámaras donde se esconden los tesoros. Armado sólo con una ballesta, debe superar las diversas criaturas que custodian la cámara, atrapar el tesoro y volver a salir. Cuando recoja el tesoro de cada una de las cámaras de una mazmorra, podrá pasar a la siguiente mazmorra, que será mas difícil que la anterior, aumentando el desafío de Venture para el jugador.

game.name: Victory
game.desc: Victory is based on the Arcade game of the same name. Use your Coleco Roller Controller to rotate your ship as the space around you scrolls by, smack your fire button to take out anything that moves and snag a power-up or two along the way to aid in your quest. Similar in style to Asteroids, but with a moving background.

game.name: Video Hustler
game.desc: With an overhead view of the table, you play a billiards variant called "Pocket Ball" with just six object balls. Imprecise control over the aim and velocity of your shots.

game.name: War Games
game.desc:
Saludos, profesor Falken. ¿Vamos a jugar un juego?
Este juego de estrategia está basado en la popular película de 1983 del mismo nombre, protagonizada por Matthew Broderick. Puede recordarle a la gente el Comando de Misiles, pero la acción es más lenta y se distribuye en seis pantallas que representan diferentes áreas de los EE. UU. Los misiles, aviones y submarinos enemigos atacarán y debes dirigir tus propias fuerzas, que incluyen misiles, aviones, submarinos y satélites, para interceptarlos. Cada tipo de defensa tiene fortalezas y debilidades (los misiles son rápidos pero de alcance limitado, los aviones son más lentos pero tienen alcance ilimitado). Los satélites son una mejor defensa general, pero solo están disponibles de vez en cuando. Algunas armas no están disponibles en ciertas áreas y algunos enemigos son resistentes a ciertas armas, por lo que debes modificar tu estrategia en consecuencia.

game.name: War Room
game.desc: War Room es una simulación de los escenarios computarizados de juegos de guerra que se juegan al más alto nivel de las superpotencias mundiales. Es una representación extremadamente gráfica y realista de un enfrentamiento nuclear entre los Estados Unidos y Rusia.

game.name: Wing War
game.desc: Wing War is an action game where you control a dragon. Beginning in your underground cave, your goal is to capture a sparkling diamond. To do this, you will first need to unlock the secret passage by bringing a fire, water and air crystal back to your cave. Crystals can be found by exploring the various locations available, usually you will need to destroy one of the many enemies so they turn into a crystal. Fire and water crystals can not be in the cave alone at the same time, an air crystal must be placed between them; so you will need to bring back the crystals in the order fire, air, water or water, air, fire. Once you've done this a super crystal is formed unlocking the secret passage so you can try to get the diamond! Your dragon has a limited amount of energy; being hit by enemies will cause the energy to deplete, and the game ends when all of your dragons have lost all their energy.

game.name: Wizard Of Id's Wizmath
game.desc:
Spook needs to escape from the King of Id's dungeons. He slips out but Turnkey is in pursuit. He needs to solve math problems to open the way to his escape.
Wizard of Id's WizMath is an educational game to teach mathematics. Using your joystick, you must move blocks into place so they complete a correct math problem and answer. If you push against a block, you will send it flying until it hits a wall or another block. You can also face a block and hold down the button. While keeping the button down, you can then slide the block as needed. There is a sixty second time limit and you are being pursued by Turnkey. Early levels require only one math problem to exit but later levels require two or more.
Early in the game, you can select a floor on an elevator. The higher the floor, the more difficult the math problems. The game also asks your age. The older you say you are, the higher a floor it tries to start you on, although you can select a lower floor.

game.name: Word Feud
game.desc: Victory doesn't always belong to the fastest player in WORD FEUD. It's not enough to quickly find a likely word match in the maze and move your window over it. You must also be sure that it is the right word and that means finding the other copy! Remember ? even if you think you've found the right word. it might not he the one you want because in each round there is always decoy word there to confuse you The decoy word can even he the same word as the one hidden, but with different colors!

game.name: Zaxxon
game.desc: ZAXXON te empuja hacia las profundidades del espacio exterior. Pon a prueba tus habilidades como piloto en la posición de comando. Prepárese para un desafío lleno de acción de supervivencia espacial. Sume puntos mientras bucea, asciende y desciende para destruir la fortaleza flotante del enemigo. ¡Esquiva las barreras láser mortales, los misiles enemigos y los disparos rápidos! Destruye los tanques de combustible enemigos y tu propio suministro se repone. Sobrevive al ataque de la flota de combate del enemigo y enfrenta el último desafío ... el poderoso robot blindado ZAXXON.

game.name: Zaxxon
game.desc: ZAXXON te empuja hacia las profundidades del espacio exterior. Pon a prueba tus habilidades como piloto en la posición de comando. Prepárese para un desafío lleno de acción de supervivencia espacial. Sume puntos mientras bucea, asciende y desciende para destruir la fortaleza flotante del enemigo. ¡Esquiva las barreras láser mortales, los misiles enemigos y los disparos rápidos! Destruye los tanques de combustible enemigos y tu propio suministro se repone. Sobrevive al ataque de la flota de combate del enemigo y enfrenta el último desafío ... el poderoso robot blindado ZAXXON.

game.name: Zenji
game.desc: Zenji is an action/strategy game where you control a rolling face throughout a maze. Each section of the maze can be rotated by the face. The goal is to turn the entire maze green by connecting each section of the maze to the source at the center of the screen. After all sections of the maze have been connected, you can move on to the next, more challenging level. In addition to having a time limit to complete your task, you need to avoid the flames and sparks which wander about the maze. From time to time a number will appear in a maze section and count down from 9 to 0. If you touch the number before it disappears, bonus points are earned. As the levels progress, the mazes become larger, trickier and more flames will appear.
